projects.title: Modern Web Application
projects.description: A full-stack web application built with Vue.js and Node.js, featuring real-time updates and modern UI.
projects.fullDescription:
This modern web application showcases the latest in web development technologies and best practices. Built with Vue.js on the frontend and Node.js on the backend, it delivers a seamless user experience with real-time updates.

Key Features:
- Real-time data synchronization
- Modern, responsive UI
- Advanced state management
- REST API integration
- Performance optimization

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A scalable e-commerce solution with advanced features and seamless user experience.
projects.fullDescription:
A comprehensive e-commerce platform built for scalability and performance. This solution provides everything needed for modern online retail, from product management to order processing.

Key Features:
- Product catalog management
- Shopping cart functionality
- Secure payment processing
- Order management system
- Analytics dashboard

projects.title: AI Chatbot Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent chatbot powered by machine learning for customer support automation.
projects.fullDescription:
This AI-powered chatbot uses natural language processing to provide intelligent customer support. It learns from interactions to continuously improve its responses.

Key Features:
- Natural language understanding
- Context-aware responses
- Multi-language support
- Integration APIs
- Analytics dashboard

projects.title: Mobile Fitness App
projects.description: A cross-platform mobile application for fitness tracking and workout planning.
projects.fullDescription:
A comprehensive fitness tracking application that helps users achieve their health goals. Built with React Native for cross-platform compatibility.

Key Features:
- Workout tracking
- Nutrition planning
- Progress visualization
- Social sharing
- Offline support
